alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 8:55PM MST until March 02 at 12:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southern Gila Highlands/Black Range. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to noon MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially along NM- 152 and NM-15. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
